name: adenoidal
content:

relating to or seeming to come from the adenoids (= the flesh between the back of the nose and the throat): He sings in a slightly adenoidal voice. I was woken up by Fran's adenoidal snoring. Synonym
adenoidRelated word
adenoids
More examplesFewer examplesShe speaks with an adenoidal croak.The patient has gross adenoidal enlargement.The adenoidal whine of their accents dulled her hearing.
